body_html: You are mixing up spatial (image gradients) which are respect to a change in position and gradients with respect to parameters of the ML model. Using a fixed 2d convolution as you show here is the correct solution. tf.gradients is used only for computing gradients with respect to variables in your model. In this case, creating a convolution that uses a constant to implement a gradient is what you want to do. Creating a helper function to do this may or may not be interesting. @shlens, do you have any thoughts?
